Detailed Description

PbBaseProvider is the base provider for all types of SIM phonebooks: ADN GSM 11.11 V8.2.0 10.5.1 FDN GSM 11.11 V8.2.0 10.5.2 MSISDN GSM 11.11 V8.2.0 10.5.5 LND GSM 11.11 V8.2.0 10.5.8 SDN GSM 11.11 V8.2.0 10.5.9 BDN GSM 11.11 V8.2.0 10.5.13 CPHS_MBOX CPHS 4.2 Standard CPHS_INFONO CPHS 4.2 Standard

it allows retrieving data from and changing data on the sim. This class is an abstract base class and cannot be instantiated.

Following column ids are defined: c_simpos_id :NumberType: returns the position in the sim file c_phone_no_id :PhoneNumberType: returns the phonenumber of the entry, might be empty (invalid) c_name_id :WStringType: returns the name of the entry coded in GSM 11.11 V8.2.0 Annex B. c_alphatagsize_id :NumberType: returns the maximal size of the name in bytes. c_nextfreeposition_id :NumberType: returns the next sim storage position. c_freeextrecords_id :NumberType: returns the number of free ext-records for the phonebook. c_index_level_id :NumberType: returns the index level indicator from 0-15, only valid for c_cphs_infono_provider_id. c_nw_spec_id :NumberType: returns if the nework specific indicator is set, only valid for c_cphs_infono_provider_id. c_premium_serv_id :NumberType: returns if the premium service indicator is set, only valid for c_cphs_infono_provider_id. c_cmi_record_id :NumberType: returns the record id which points to the EF-CMI file, only valid for c_bdn_provider_id. If the value 255 is returned or set, the value does not refer to the EF-CMI file. Valid ranges are 1-254, Value 1 represents the Row 0 inside the CmiProvider.
